doc.title: Liberation
doc.plot: Leo Hymas left home before his 18th birthday to join in the fight against the Nazi's, he was one of the first American soldiers to discover and enter a concentration camp. Klaus Stern was taken to a concentration camp before his 18th birthday and survived unspeakable atrocities. The documentary "Liberation" follows the hardships that both men endure until their stories intersect and despair turns to hope as Leo's fight ends and Klaus' freedom begins.
